formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Windows Azure.

formElement.label: Subnet:
formElement.documentation: Name of the subnet to be created.

formElement.label: Virtual Network Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the virtual network in which subnet will be present.

formElement.label: Resource Group Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the resource group in which subnet is to be created.

formElement.label: Address Prefix:
formElement.documentation: It should follow CIDR notation, for example 10.0.0.0/24.

formElement.label: Network Security Group:
formElement.documentation: Network security Group to be attached. Network Security Group of same name can be present in multiple resource group. Provide Json to uniquely identify Network Security Group. Example: {"RG1":"NSG1"}

formElement.label: Route Table:
formElement.documentation: RouteTable of same name can be present in multiple resource group. Provide Json to uniquely identify RouteTable. Example: {"RG1":"routeTable"}

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
